Articles.Content: Anyone know what happened to Raiderrick and his us probes pack? Saw his forum status is "gone" and the download folders are gone? Those were great packs, especially with all the interest in New Horizons right now?

He got mad and quit but there is a thread for most or all his stuff will re-post if can found the thread.

Here it is [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations?p=2017579#post2017579](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/125397-Historical-Rockets-Probes-and-Stations?p=2017579#post2017579)

EDIT- But it looks like it's for RO so you might have to do alittle editing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T18:18:37Z" title="07/12/2015 06:18  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

Thanks- Luckily Google cache is my friend and I found the download pack that hadn't been scrubbed yet. I wish the guy didn't quit, he made some really nice stuff to go along with some of the new launchers/launchers pack,

IE: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78741-Launchers-Pack-V2-0-1-United-Launch-Alliance-Update-%2Ain-development%2A](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/78741-Launchers-Pack-V2-0-1-United-Launch-Alliance-Update-%2Ain-development%2A)
